item.description:
Need a break from the stress of work, the economy, and everyday life? Looking for something to do that is fun, cheap and progressive?

Join us for Games for Justice at My Thai Vegan Cafe*! Arrive by yourself or bring a friend.

Scrabble, Boggle, Apples to Apples, Scattegories - what's your favorite board game? Bring it!

Look no further if you're seeking like-minded folks to game with, want to cross-promote your events and campaigns while you Boggle, or are new to the area and looking for groups to get involved in. If you want to build a strong cross-issue social justice movement, SoJust is for you!

Haven't been to My Thai? The food is delicious! Check out the My Thai menu filled with yummy vegan options. Menu prices are reasonable, but they've requested an $8 minimum per person, so come hungry!

*My Thai is located in Chinatown, 3 Beach Street, 2nd floor, at the corner of Washington St. Sorry, but this venue is not wheelchair accessible.
MBTA: Chinatown stop/Orange Line, Boylston St. stop/Green Line


Join us if you want to cross-promote your events and campaigns while enjoying great cocktails, are new to the area and looking for groups to get involved in, or you've been looking for like-minded progressives to hang with in Boston. Newcomers always welcomed!

Hey organizers! If you're involved with a group or project and want to spread the word bring flyers - there'll be lots of opportunity to schmooze and network.


Want to connect outside of SoJust events? Members can view and post events, job & volunteer announcements, roommate searches, etc. on the website - just click 'Messages'. The SoJust Calendar is packed with social justice-related events held throughout Greater Boston. Help us keep it filled - tell us about events you hear about.


Wanna know more about SoJust? Check out our Frequently Asked Questions and Event Photos.
item.name: Games for Justice
